definitions.definition: Causing pain or discomfort; painfully sensitive.
definitions.example: Her feet were sore from walking so far.

definitions.definition: Sensitive; tender; easily pained, grieved, or vexed; very susceptible of irritation.

definitions.example: The school was in sore need of textbooks, theirs having been ruined in the flood.

definitions.definition: Feeling animosity towards someone; annoyed or angered.
definitions.example: Joe was sore at Bob for beating him at checkers.
